@componentDatatype.description: Subset of XSD datatypes supported in simple models

concept.description: A class reference is the SKOS preferred label of a class. This label MUST be unique within the transitive closure of the vocabulary referenced by the manifest.

unit.description: A unit is referenced by its QUDT symbol. It MUST be unique within the QUDT units defined in the vocabularies declared in the manifest.

allOf.$comment: constraint on fill values if component data type is any numeric type
constraint on fill values if component data type is any numeric type
constraint on fill values if component data type is boolean
constraint on fill values if component data type is string

oneOf.$comment: homogenous array of data used in explicit dimension arrays
homogenous array of numbers
homogenous array of booleans
homogenous array of strings

items.$comment: homogenous array of data used in explicit measure arrays, may contain null values

oneOf.$comment: homogenous array of numbers, may contain null values
homogenous array of booleans, may contain null values
homogenous array of strings, may contain null values

items.$comment: heterogenous array of data used in point arrays
